verbs.description: [ARG0: Comedian Michelle Wolf] [V: sparked] [ARG1: controversy] [ARGM-MNR: with her brutal speech at Saturday 's White House Correspondents ' Dinner] , [ARGM-ADV: blasting President Donald Trump – who skipped the event to hold a rally in Michigan – and administration officials in the racy half - hour roast] .
